DOC.brief_title: Pediatric Emergency Department Decision Support System Reduce Secondhand Smoke
DOC.detailed_description: The study first develop evaluate Pediatric Emergency Department ( PED ) Decision Support System ( DSS ) -Electronic Medical Records ( EMR ) System facilitate identification smoker delivery Second Hand Smoke ( SHSe ) exposure intervention caregiver bring child PED . The investigator conduct two-phased project develop , refine , integrate Decision Support System current electronic medical record system . In Phase I , investigator develop three-part DSS prompt : 1 ) ASK child SHSe caregiver smoke 2 ) Use software program ( REDCap ) ADVISE caregiver reduce child 's SHSe via total smoking home car ban quit smoking , 3 ) ASSIST caregiver quit directly connect choice free cessation resource ( e.g. , Quitline , txt2quit , smokefree.gov ) PED visit . If investigator discover teen participant smoker , investigator provide resource Quitline , tx2quit , teen.smokefree.gov . The investigator create report provide feedback nurse SHSe counsel behavior . Nurses provide input program content , function , design . In Phase II , investigator conduct 3-month feasibility trial test result implement DSS change nurse SHSe-related behavior , child caregiver outcome .
